name: Xerneas Pokemon Showdown Style
description: A xerneas based CSS made for Pokemon Showdown servers, PS: this css is usable on servers, you can copy paste the css in your css file for your server if you want, tho another server is already using it. If you see any error or something that looks weird, please PM me in a server such as origin, I'm usually under the name Master Float.
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    22ᵗʰ March 2015:
      - putting .select's border-top-left-radius to 0px

    11ᵗʰ April 2015:
      - Added some credits

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.
